articles.title: Android 15 improves standby battery life by up to 3 hours on some devices - Android Authority
articles.description: Google says they’ve sped up how fast phones enter doze mode by 50% in Android 15. The result is improved standby battery life.
articles.content:
• Google says theyve sped up how fast phones enter doze mode by 50% in Android 15.
  • The result is that some devices are seeing up to 3 hours longer standby power on the latest OS.

articles.author: Abner Li
articles.title: Setting the stage at I/O 2024 for Gemini being Google's last reset - 9to5Google
articles.description: Originally, my interest in Google came down to how I think it does cool-to-wild things with technology in an accessible/affordable...
articles.content:
Originally, my interest in Google came down to how I think it does cool-to-wild things with technology in an accessible/affordable manner that nobody else is doing.
